DataElement.preferredName: Next Transplantation Or Cellular Therapy Infusion Procedure Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the next transplantation or cellular therapy infusion procedure was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Next Transplantation Or Cellular Therapy Infusion Procedure Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Next Transplantation Or Cellular Therapy Infusion Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.:Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy.:A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream.

Concepts.definition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy.
Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
